detectors.description:
Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#97-102) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool)(_value >= 0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#98)
Parameter Token.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#74) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transfer(address,uint256)._to (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.transfer(address,uint256)._value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#78) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approve(address,uint256)._spender (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#97) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.approve(address,uint256)._value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#97) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.allowance(address,address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#104) is not in mixedCase
Parameter Token.allowance(address,address)._spender (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#104) is not in mixedCase

MerculetToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#113-115) uses literals with too many digits:
	- Token(10000000000,18,Merculet,MVP) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#113)
detectors.markdown:
[MerculetToken.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#L113-L115) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [Token(10000000000,18,Merculet,MVP)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#L113)

detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#74-76)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#5)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#6)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#78-85)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#8)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#97-102)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#104-106)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MerculetToken.sol#9)
